name: Malaise (gadaursan)
description:
An semi-autobiography and visual novel about carrying a group project by yourself.

Samantha Ho is a few months away from graduating college, and she has a group project in her typical computer science class. Her partner is... just the very... best... and ditches her, leaving her to complete the project all by herself. The stress leads her to question if she really wanted to be a computer science major in the first place.

Features:

  • 1 - 2 hours long
  • An unhealthy amount of self-deprecation
  • An arranged marriage with your college major: Computer Science
  • Coding blues
  • That one friend who annoys you but means well

Warning: This game has brief depictions depression and emotional abuse.
